mapper.select: select p.p_num "pro_p_num", o.o_num, s.s_name "pro_stock.s_name", sz.size_category_name "sizes.size_category_name", a.a_price "pro_a_a_price", o.o_date, od.d_status "pro_od.d_status" from stock s, product p, sizes sz, orders o, auction a, order_delivery od where a.a_num in (select c.a_num from auction a, catch c where id=#{id} and a.a_num=c.a_num) and sz.size_category_num = s.size_category_num and s.s_num=p.s_num and p.p_num=a.p_num and a.a_num=o.a_num and o.o_num=od.o_num order by o.o_date desc

select * from ( select rownum rn, a.* from ( select p.p_num "pro_p_num", o.o_num, s.s_name "pro_stock.s_name", sz.size_category_name "sizes.size_category_name", a.a_price "pro_a_a_price", o.o_date, od.d_status "pro_od.d_status" from stock s, product p, sizes sz, orders o, auction a, order_delivery od where a.a_num in (select c.a_num from auction a, catch c where id=#{id} and a.a_num=c.a_num) and sz.size_category_num = s.size_category_num and s.s_num=p.s_num and p.p_num=a.p_num and a.a_num=o.a_num and o.o_num=od.o_num order by o.o_date desc ) a) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
